trans-unit.source: Best practices for monitoring distributed applications in the cloud.
trans-unit.target: Best practices for monitoring distributed applications in the cloud.

trans-unit.source: Distributed applications and service running in the cloud are, by their very nature, complex pieces of software that comprise many moving parts.
trans-unit.target: Distributed applications and service running in the cloud are, by their very nature, complex pieces of software that comprise many moving parts.

trans-unit.source: In a production environment, it is important to be able to track the way in which users utilize your system, trace resource utilization, and generally monitor the health and performance of your system.

trans-unit.source: Monitoring enables you to gain an insight into how well a system is functioning, and is a crucial part in maintaining quality-of-service targets.
trans-unit.target: Monitoring enables you to gain an insight into how well a system is functioning, and is a crucial part in maintaining quality-of-service targets.

trans-unit.source: Some common scenarios for collecting monitoring data include:

trans-unit.source: Tracking the availability of the system and its component elements.
trans-unit.target: Tracking the availability of the system and its component elements.

trans-unit.target: Maintaining performance to ensure that the throughput of the system does not degrade unexpectedly as the volume of work increases.

trans-unit.source: Guaranteeing that the system meets any SLAs agreed with customers.

trans-unit.source: Protecting the privacy and security of the system, users, and their data.
trans-unit.target: Protecting the privacy and security of the system, users, and their data.

trans-unit.source: Tracking the operations that are performed auditing or regulatory purposes.
trans-unit.target: Tracking the operations that are performed auditing or regulatory purposes.

trans-unit.target: Monitoring the day-to-day usage of the system and help spot trends that could lead to problems if they are not addressed.

trans-unit.source: The following list summarizes best practices for instrumenting a distributed application running in the cloud.
trans-unit.target: The following list summarizes best practices for instrumenting a distributed application running in the cloud.

trans-unit.source: Make logs easy to read and easy to parse.
trans-unit.target: Make logs easy to read and easy to parse.

trans-unit.source: Use structured logging where possible.
trans-unit.target: Use structured logging where possible.

trans-unit.source: Be concise and descriptive in log messages.
trans-unit.target: Be concise and descriptive in log messages.

trans-unit.source: In all logs, identify the source and provide context and timing information as each log record is written.
trans-unit.target: In all logs, identify the source and provide context and timing information as each log record is written.

trans-unit.source: Use the same time zone and format for all timestamps.
trans-unit.target: Use the same time zone and format for all timestamps.

trans-unit.source: This will help to correlate events for operations that span hardware and services running in different geographic regions.
trans-unit.target: This will help to correlate events for operations that span hardware and services running in different geographic regions.

trans-unit.source: Categorize logs and write messages to the appropriate log file.
trans-unit.target: Categorize logs and write messages to the appropriate log file.

trans-unit.source: Do not disclose sensitive information about the system or personal information about users.
trans-unit.target: Do not disclose sensitive information about the system or personal information about users.

trans-unit.source: Scrub this information before it is logged, but ensure that the relevant details are retained.
trans-unit.target: Scrub this information before it is logged, but ensure that the relevant details are retained.

trans-unit.source: For example, remove the ID and password from any database connection strings, but write the remaining information to the log so that an analyst can determine that the system is accessing the correct database.
trans-unit.target: For example, remove the ID and password from any database connection strings, but write the remaining information to the log so that an analyst can determine that the system is accessing the correct database.

trans-unit.source: Log all critical exceptions, but enable the administrator to turn logging on and off for lower levels of exceptions and warnings.
trans-unit.target: Log all critical exceptions, but enable the administrator to turn logging on and off for lower levels of exceptions and warnings.

trans-unit.source: Also, capture and log all retry logic information.
trans-unit.target: Also, capture and log all retry logic information.

trans-unit.source: This data can be useful in monitoring the transient health of the system.
trans-unit.target: This data can be useful in monitoring the transient health of the system.

trans-unit.source: Trace out of process calls, such as requests to external web services or database.
trans-unit.target: Trace out of process calls, such as requests to external web services or database.

trans-unit.source: Don’t mix log messages with different security requirements in the same log file.
trans-unit.target: Don’t mix log messages with different security requirements in the same log file.

trans-unit.source: For example, don't write debug and audit information to the same log.
trans-unit.target: For example, don't write debug and audit information to the same log.

trans-unit.source: With the exception of auditing events, all logging calls should be fire-and-forget operations that must not block the progress of business operations.
trans-unit.target: With the exception of auditing events, all logging calls should be fire-and-forget operations that must not block the progress of business operations.

trans-unit.source: Auditing events are exceptional because they are critical to the business and can be classified as a fundamental part of business operations.
trans-unit.target: Auditing events are exceptional because they are critical to the business and can be classified as a fundamental part of business operations.

trans-unit.source: Logging should be extensible and not have any direct dependencies on concrete target.
trans-unit.target: Logging should be extensible and not have any direct dependencies on concrete target.

trans-unit.source: For example, rather than writing information by using System.Diagnostics.Trace, define an abstract interface (such as ILogger) which exposes logging methods and that can be implemented by using any appropriate means.
trans-unit.target: For example, rather than writing information by using System.Diagnostics.Trace, define an abstract interface (such as ILogger) which exposes logging methods and that can be implemented by using any appropriate means.

trans-unit.source: All logging must be fail-safe and should never trigger any cascading errors.
trans-unit.target: All logging must be fail-safe and should never trigger any cascading errors.

trans-unit.source: Logging must not throw any exceptions.
trans-unit.target: Logging must not throw any exceptions.

trans-unit.source: Treat instrumentation as an ongoing iterative process and review logs regularly, not just when there is a problem.
trans-unit.target: Treat instrumentation as an ongoing iterative process and review logs regularly, not just when there is a problem.
